title: Man City avoid play-offs with Galatasary win
body_text:
Man City avoid play-offs with Galatasary win
This content isn't available any more.
There was an error
Manchester City beat Galatasaray to confirm a spot in the round of 16 of the UEFA Champions League by narrowly finishing eighth in the league phase.
MATCH REPORT: Manchester City 2-0 Galatasaray
Available to UK users only.
